oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vereinfachte Berechnung der Grauen Energie in Gebäuden
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koesling, Matthias
Fystro, Gustav
Ruge, Gesa
Hansen, Sissel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings and machinery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple building component framework for agricultural buildings has been adapted to estimate their embodied energy. Based on the results from a case study of 20 dairy farms in Norway we conclude that the amount of embodied energy in buildings is a variable but notable component and highlight the important factors for this variation. This research advances knowledge and practice of embodied energy calculations for existing farm buildings. The findings advance overall energy consumption and future planning of farming buildings and businesses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Koesling, Matthias; Fystro, Gustav; Ruge, Gesa and Hansen, Sissel (2014) Vereinfachte Berechnung der Grauen Energie in Gebäuden. [A approach to calculate embodied energy in agricultural buildings.] Poster at: 13. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Hochschule für nachhaltige Entwicklung Eberswalde, 17. - 20. März 2015.
